title: Fleuve
description:
_French: a river_

- Create flows by connecting cards.

## Try it out!

- Press the right arrow twice to activate the next card.

title: Another card
description:
## Nice!

- Press the down arrow to select the card below this one.
- Press space, enter, or right arrow to activate it.

title: A sibling card
description:
## Well done!

- Now activate the next card below and edit its title.

title: Edit me
description:
## Editing cards

- Press tab to focus the title and edit it. 
- Press enter or escape when done.
- Press D or E to edit the description, or double-click it.

_Use markdown to format descriptions._

title: Delete me
description:
## It’s okay, I don’t mind.

Press backspace to delete this card. You’ll be asked to confirm before the card is removed.

title: Infinite levels
description:
## Drill, drill drill

- Press the right arrow to drill down through the hierarchy.
- Press the left arrow to drill back up.

title: Keep going!
description:
## Add more cards

- Press the right arrow to connect a card to this one.
- Press the down arrow to add a card at the same level as this one.

title: Reorder cards
description:
## Up is up, down is down

- Press shift up arrow to move a card up.
- Press shift down arrow to move it down.

_Drag and drop? Stay tuned._
